title: Vegan Cauliflower Cheese (Gluten-Free + Dairy Free)
directions: Blend all ingredients in a high speed blender, except the cauliflower and including ¼ of the brown onion (set the rest aside).
Pour the sauce into a small saucepan and whisk for about 5 - 8 minutes until thickened.
Dice the remaining brown onion and add saute in a medium pan in some coconut oil for about 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, break the cauliflower into florets and steam for about 6 minutes.
In a small bowl combine the sauted onion, steamed cauliflower and cheese sauce.
Add to a baking dish, sprinkle with parmesan cheese and bake for 15 - 20 minutes.
ingredients: ½ cup cashews or macadamias, soaked 3 - 8 hours
1 cup water or dairy-free milk alternative (coconut, almond etc)
